instanceVariables.name: fvFlashTime_on
instanceVariables.desc: Duration in seconds of the flashing effect "on" time.

instanceVariables.name: fvFlashTime_off
instanceVariables.desc: Duration in seconds of the flashing effect "off" time. If -1, ignored and assume it is symmetric to the "on" duration.

instanceVariables.name: fvFlashDuration
instanceVariables.desc: Duration in seconds of the overall flashing effect.
